short_description: Discover the raw natural beauty, incredible wildlife, and warm hospitality of Zambia, where the mighty Victoria Falls, vast national parks, and traditional villages await. Go on a safari in South Luangwa National Park, canoe down the Zambezi River, or visit the vibrant markets of Lusaka

weather.title: Zambia has a tropical climate with high temperatures and humidity year-round. It experiences a wet season from November to April, characterized by heavy rainfall, while the dry season from May to October offers drier conditions

when_to_visit.title: Dry season
when_to_visit.short_description: Sunny and dry, with little to no rainfall. Considered the peak tourist season in Zambia

when_to_visit.title: Best for safari
when_to_visit.short_description: Popular for safaris in national parks such as South Luangwa, Kafue, and Lower Zambezi. Wildlife congregates around water sources, making it easier to spot animals

when_to_visit.title: Rainy season
when_to_visit.short_description: High temperatures and rainfall, especially from December to March. Some areas may become inaccessible during this period

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Zambia is from May to October when the weather is pleasant, with mild temperatures, dry conditions, and excellent opportunities for wildlife viewing in the national parks
